CustomField.description: PSA - Evaluates to checked (aka True) if the Project Manager for related Project is the Logged In User. If user is not the PM, then evaluates to unchecked (aka False)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Evaluates to checked if the Project Manager for related Project is the Logged In User. If user is not the PM, then evaluates to unchecked.
CustomField.label: Project Manager is Logged In User
